Transaction successful N/A Wallet is not selected Activities will appear here -- -- Sending… Get address from QR Code The higher the gas price, the more expensive your transaction fee will be, but the quicker your transaction will be processed by the Ethereum network. The gas limit prevents smart contracts from consuming all your Ethereum. We will try to calculate the gas limit automatically for you, but some smart contracts may require a custom gas limit. Privacy Policy Terms of Service privacyPolicy.html termsOfService.html tokenscript_explaination.html 24 hours Appreciation %1$s/Ticket Ethereum Ethereum Blockchain Issuer: DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED Your phone is rooted but the keys are still protected by Android secure enclave encryption. The attack vector would be from a keyboard app or clipboard viewer learning your key when you enter it. Woooo does its best to mitigate this risk by switching off keyboard auto-suggest. If you run root, recommend you only use mainstream keyboard apps, run a good quality anti-virus app and use a respected open source root manager such as Magisk or SuperSU to limit access to root privileges. Ultimately key safety is your responsibility. Still need help? Contact us Confirm Sale? DD/MM/YYYY Before the link expires, anyone with the MagicLink can purchase your tickets with one click. Important 0.00 ETH Change Wallet Facebook Twitter ERC 20 ERC 875 ERC 875* ERC 1155 Ethereum is an open-source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract (scripting) functionality. It is the infrastructure for blockchain products and services.\n\nETH/Ether is a cryptocurrency whose blockchain is generated by the Ethereum platform. Ether can be transferred between accounts and used to compensate participant mining nodes for computations performed. Ethereum provides a decentralised Turing-complete virtual machine, the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), which can execute scripts using an international network of public nodes. "Gas", an internal transaction pricing mechanism, is used to mitigate spam and allocate resources on the network. Currently, Ethereum is the best and largest blockchain for developing smart contract application and services. Woooo starts with supporting Ethereum blockchain and helps improving its technology. You can convert Ethereum to fiat money and transfer it to your bank account through any cryptocurrency exchange. You can provide your wallet address to the sender. They can transfer ETH to you with your wallet address. Your Wallet is not backed up! You have not backed up your wallet yet. You have $200 USD net. Act now. BACK UP WALLET %1$s → Authentication Cancelled Authentication Failed Back up your wallet with seed phrase Making a backup is very simple and safe: just write down 12 words and keep them in a secret place, offline. Back up my wallet Write down seed phrase\non paper OK, I wrote this down Verify Seed Phrase Continue Invalid recovery phrase. Please check and try again. Manage Wallet Show Seed Phrase Lose this Wallet If you lose access to this device, your funds will be lost, unless you back up! Be careful with deleting your wallet. If you have not backed up your wallet, you might lose all your funds. Export Keystore JSON What is Keystore JSON? A Keystore is a text file. You can copy its content and place when you want to import your wallet. Test my seed phrase Making backup is very simple and safe just write down %1$s words and keep them in a safe place, offline. A KeyStore is a text file. You can copy its content and place when you want to import your wallet. This is a safe way to back up a wallet. Set Keystore Password NOTE: You must remember your password. We do not store your password elsewhere. KeyStore is always encrypted, otherwise whoever has it can gain the money. Save Keystore Do not share your backup. Woooo team members will not ask for it. Enter seed phrase If your seed phrase is not in English, please convert it to English on your own using tools like this https://iancoleman.io/bip39/ Invalid recovery phrase. Please check and try again. IMPORT FROM ICLOUD/DROPBOX/GOOGLE DRIVE Enter private key NOTE: You must remember your password. We do not store your password elsewhere. KeyStore is always encrypted, otherwise whoever has it can gain the money. Private key is hex only: use a–f A–F and 0–9 Nothing to share Browse to a DApp to share it. Time to back up your Wallet We highly recommend to back up your wallet every month. Use Pin Touch the fingerprint sensor Unlock Private Key Device Not Secure Your device is not locked by Fingerprint, PIN or other Biometric. Cannot create a secured private key until the device has some protection. Remind me later Change Wallet Legacy Wallets Backup postponed. Key Error Password 6 characters or more Create a new Wallet Watch I already have a wallet: Watch-only Wallets Enter Ethereum Address Ethereum Address: 0x then 40 characters of 0–9 a-f A-F Watch Wallet Receive Payment Back up your Wallet Your funds will be at risk if you do not back up before using your wallet. Try enabling security on your phone. A seed phrase, seed recovery phrase or backup seed phrase is a list of words which store all the information needed to recover a crypto wallet. Wallet software will typically generate a seed phrase and instruct the user to write it down on paper.
